summary: AT 90,015 SERVICED MILES, THE VEHICLE WAS TRAVELING AT 60 MPH.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AND THE ENGINE FAILED.  DRIVER COASTED TO A STOP SEVERAL HUNDRED FEET.  TENSIONER FAILED AFTER MOTOR SEIZED UP.  DEALER OFFERED TO INSTALL NEW ENGINE FOR >$4500 AND WAS TOLD TO CALL NATIONAL NUMBER.  DODGE TOLD ME THAT MY ONLY RECOURSE WAS IN COURT, AND THAT WAS THE END OF THE CONVERSATION.   *NLM
